name: Nycaloth
damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
descriptions: The nycaloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. The nycaloth can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

descriptions.raw: At will: darkness, detect magic, dispel magic, invisibility (self only), mirror image
descriptions.hyperlinked: At will: darkness, detect magic, dispel magic, invisibility (self only), mirror image

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
descriptions: The nycaloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Magic Weapons.
descriptions: The nycaloth's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The nycaloth makes two melee attacks, or it makes one melee attack and teleports before or after the attack.

actions.name: Claw.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or take 5 (2d4) slashing damage at the start of each of its turns due to a fiendish wound. Each time the nycaloth hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 5 (2d4). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful DC 13 Wisdom (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

actions.name: Greataxe.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d12 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Teleport.
descriptions: The nycaloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

actions.name: Variant: Summon Yugoloth (1/Day).
descriptions: The yugoloth chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.
A nycaloth has a 50 percent chance of summoning 1d4 mezzoloths or one nycaloth.

A summoned yugoloth appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, does as it pleases, and can't summon other yugoloths. The summoned yugoloth remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner takes a bonus action to dismiss it.
